languages.text: "В Имперском культе существуют секты, последователи которых веруют в посмертное наказание грешников на пылающих планетах. Сей мир мог бы быть подобным чистилищем".

traits.locale_text: "В Культе существуют секты, последователи которых веруют в посмертное наказание грешников на пылающих планетах. Сей мир мог бы быть подобным чистилищем".

languages.text: "There are sects in the Imperial Cult whose adherents believe transgressors will be punished after death on burning planets. This world could serve as one such purgatory."
languages.original_text: "В Имперском культе существуют секты, последователи которых веруют в посмертное наказание грешников на пылающих планетах. Сей мир мог бы быть подобным чистилищем".

traits.locale_text: "There are sects in the Imperial Cult whose adherents believe sinners will be punished after death on burning planets. This world could serve as one such purgatory."
"There are sects in the Imperial Cult whose adherents believe sinners will be punished after death on burning planets. This world could serve as one such purgatory."
"There are sects in the Imperial Cult whose adherents believe sinners will be punished after death on burning planets. This world could serve as one such purgatory."
"There are sects in the Imperial Cult whose adherents believe transgressors will be punished after death on burning planets. This world could serve as one such purgatory."

languages.text: « Il existe, au sein du Culte Impérial, des sectes convaincues que les transgresseurs sont envoyés sur des planètes brûlantes après la mort, en guise de châtiment. À leurs yeux, ce monde ferait un purgatoire idéal. »
languages.original_text: "There are sects in the Imperial Cult whose adherents believe transgressors will be punished after death on burning planets. This world could serve as one such purgatory."

traits.locale_text: « Il existe, au sein du Culte Impérial, des sectes convaincues que les transgresseurs sont envoyés sur des planètes brûlantes après la mort, en guise de châtiment. À leurs yeux, ce monde ferait un purgatoire idéal. »

languages.text: “帝国国教的某些教派坚信，叛教者死后将会前往燃烧的行星受罚。这个世界像极了他们口中的炼狱。”
languages.original_text: "There are sects in the Imperial Cult whose adherents believe transgressors will be punished after death on burning planets. This world could serve as one such purgatory."

traits.locale_text: “帝国国教的某些教派坚信，叛教者死后将会前往燃烧的行星受罚。这个世界像极了他们口中的炼狱。”

languages.text: 「帝国聖教会には、罪を犯した者は死後、燃え盛る惑星で罰せられると信奉する宗派がある。この世界は、そのような煉獄のひとつとなりうるだろうさ」
languages.original_text: "There are sects in the Imperial Cult whose adherents believe transgressors will be punished after death on burning planets. This world could serve as one such purgatory."

traits.locale_text: 「帝国聖教会には、罪を犯した者は死後、燃え盛る惑星で罰せられると信奉する宗派がある。この世界は、そのような煉獄のひとつとなりうるだろうさ」

languages.text: "Es gibt im imperialen Kult Sekten, die davon überzeugt sind, dass Missetäter nach dem Tod auf brennenden Planeten bestraft werden. Diese Welt könnte als ein solches Fegefeuer dienen."
languages.original_text: "There are sects in the Imperial Cult whose adherents believe transgressors will be punished after death on burning planets. This world could serve as one such purgatory."

traits.locale_text: "Es gibt im imperialen Kult Sekten, die davon überzeugt sind, dass Missetäter nach dem Tod auf brennenden Planeten bestraft werden. Diese Welt könnte als ein solches Fegefeuer dienen."

languages.text: «Hay sectas del Culto Imperial cuyos fieles creen que los herejes sufrirán un castigo póstumo en mundos ardientes. Este podría ser uno de sus purgatorios».
languages.original_text: "There are sects in the Imperial Cult whose adherents believe transgressors will be punished after death on burning planets. This world could serve as one such purgatory."

traits.locale_text: «Hay sectas del Culto Imperial cuyos fieles creen que los herejes sufrirán un castigo póstumo en mundos ardientes. Este podría ser uno de sus purgatorios».

languages.text: "İmparatorluk Tarikatı'nda günahkârların ölümden sonra yanan gezegenlerde cezalandırılacağına inanan mezhepler vardır. Bu dünya, öylesi bir araf olarak hizmet edebilir."
languages.original_text: "There are sects in the Imperial Cult whose adherents believe transgressors will be punished after death on burning planets. This world could serve as one such purgatory."
